Rollins and Benson visit the victim at a psychiatric hospital, where she is undergoing electroshock therapy to erase the memories of her attack.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A suburban teen is brutally assaulted when a concert turns into a mob scene. Friends and eyewitnesses give mixed accounts of the event, and Detective Amaro finds himself trying to save the reputation of the prime suspect, a fellow military veteran whose fractured memory could hold the answer to why the girl was targeted.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When reports of sexual abuse surface at an elite private school, Detective Benson and ADA Barba face off against a powerful administrator to expose decades of secrets.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An armed and dangerous man goes on a killing spree with Jeannie, a prostitute with whom he has a relationship with. When Jeannie goes missing, the SVU is tasked with convincing the NYPD that her life is worth saving.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A cryptic message sends SVU on a new track to find Maddie; Benson tries to help a federal agent when the case hits too close to home; Captain Curry tries to make amends with Fin.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: An Arctic fox family must eke out a cliff top living, an eider farmer has his hands full playing duck dad to hundreds of new arrivals and Viking horsemen prepare to saddle up for the autumn roundup.

programme.title: This Is BBC Four
programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: Nihal Arthanayake, broadcaster and radio DJ, explores coast and countryside around the Cumbria and Lancashire border, and finds local characters, breathtaking views and moments of serenity along the way.

programme.title: Christmas University Challenge
programme.sub-title: University of Bristol v University of Cardiff
programme.desc: The first round of this years Christmas University Challenge concludes as graduates of the University of Bristol play former students of Cardiff, with the last place in the semi-finals at stake. Contestants include Sky Newss Dominic Waghorn and England womens cricket captain Heather Knight. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions.

programme.title: Bletchley Park: Code-Breakings Forgotten Genius
programme.desc: Gordon Welchman was one of the original elite codebreakers crucial to the allies defeating the Nazis in World War Two. He is The Forgotten Genius of Bletchley Park.

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: Celia Imrie takes a journey in the BBCs archives to tell the story of one of the most acclaimed films of all time, Alfred Hitchcocks groundbreaking 1960 horror, Psycho.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Classic chiller about the grisly goings-on in a remote motel run by a timid and decidedly odd young man and his domineering mother. The film totally changed Hollywoods perception of the horror genre and broke many of the movie industrys taboos.

programme.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
programme.desc: Stanley Kramers Oscar-winning account of the post-war courtroom proceedings against Nazi war criminals in Germany in 1948.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: Nihal Arthanayake, broadcaster and radio DJ, explores coast and countryside around the Cumbria and Lancashire border, and finds local characters, breathtaking views and moments of serenity along the way.

programme.title: Britains Pompeii: A Village Lost in Time
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts joins the team excavating a 3,000 year-old Bronze Age village in the Cambridgeshire Fens thats been called the British Pompeii. The village earned its nickname because, 3,000 years ago, it burned to the ground - as it burned, it fell into the peat, preserving both the houses and their contents. Until its discovery, we had little real idea of what life was like in Bronze Age Britain.

programme.desc: Its time to deck the halls because Ben Fogle and Kate Humble are heading back to Longleat Safari Park for a magical week of programmes. Harry the lion has a problem that could ruin his Christmas - he has broken one of his enormous canine teeth. The keepers have called in renowned dentist Peter Emily, whose plan is to perform root canal work on Harry, but to get close to his lethal jaws, they first need to knock Harry out with a sedative.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World
programme.desc: Its the series finale, and the teams must race from Medellín, Colombias second-largest city, in an epic push of over 1,000km to the finish line on the Guajira Peninsula, the northernmost region of South America. They can either cut a course inland or follow the tourist trail along the Caribbean coast. After 33 days and nearly 5,900km, which team will triumph and be the first to sign the all-important book and be crowned the winners?

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Katie and Lee ask Sara Cox and the team to recreate Hollyhill Farmhouse, the place where their love story began and family life unfolded. The house, now lost to them, holds decades of precious memories.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson joins two fitness fans hunting for a dream Cornish home near the coast. After some promising house tours, they all try a spot of gig boat racing in Padstow.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Astaire and Rogers Sing George and Ira Gershwin
programme.desc: A compilation of classic songs from the `Great American Songbook written by brothers George and Ira Gershwin for Fred Astaire and Ginger Rogers.

programme.title: Goodbye, Mr. Chips
programme.desc: The story of a British schoolmaster whose sense of humour endears him to his students and a London music-hall star.

programme.title: Gorilla Family and Me
programme.desc: In the dangerous forests of the Democratic Republic of Congo Gordon Buchanan meets the fearsome leader of his gorilla family, Chimanuka, and two baby gorillas, one a lonely orphan. As Gordon gains the trust of these mysterious, seldom-seen gorillas as he discovers their incredible compassion and gets caught up in a battle between giant rival silverbacks for control of the family.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Claire Rawle and Michael Baggott discover an amethyst and pearl brooch and a set of Beatles signatures, and Paul visits London to unearth the hidden architectural gems of one of Wiltshires most famous sons - Sir Christopher Wren.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: In this special festive edition, celebrity contestants Richie Anderson, Simon Gregson, Jessica Knappett and Debbie McGee take on a series of rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara returns with more behind-the-scenes action from the world of Strictly, and theres another visit to the training rooms to see how the couples are coping with their second dances.

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers Twelve Days of Christmas
programme.desc: The Hairy Bikers journey through the verses of one of our most popular Christmas songs. For each line of the song, the boys have come up with a fantastic twist on a classic Christmas dish. From roast partridge with spiced pears (a partridge in a pear tree) and a classic trio of top end Poulets de Bresse chicken dishes (three French hens) to spiced Christmas pannacotta (eight Maids a-milking).

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul Whitehouse takes Bob Mortimer on the ultimate fishing adventure to the magical country of Norway, where the locals say that cod is God and fishing takes precedence over almost everything else. This is Pauls type of Christmas break, and it will be the first time they have fished together beyond the UK and Ireland.

programme.title: The Man in the Mask: An Orkney Murder
programme.desc: Twelve years after the murder, a new eyewitness dramatically comes forward saying he saw Michael Ross with a balaclava and a gun just before the murder. Hazel investigates his story.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: The RNLI volunteers face a search in one of the worst storms in living memory, race to save three people caught in a rip current and two men stuck on an oil rigs anchor chain.

programme.title: QI
programme.desc: Sandi Toksvig wonders who, what and why with Daliso Chaponda, Susan Calman, Cariad Lloyd and Alan Davies.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: Civilisations: Rise and Fall
programme.desc: The Aztecs battle to save their civilisation from Spanish invaders - but is the real threat from the enemy within?

programme.title: Kingdom
programme.desc: Injured wild dog Flint helps care for Storms largest ever litter of pups. Leopard Mutima searches for a home, and the lions are challenged by forces beyond their control.

programme.title: Civilisations: Rise and Fall

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler disagree over how to redecorate Rachels old room, and despite Phoebes admonitions, Ross makes a drastic decision about Rachel.

programme.sub-title: The One Where Joey Loses His Insurance

programme.desc: Chandler doesnt want new flatmate Janine to make the apartment too `girly, Ross overdoses on tooth whitener before a date, and Phoebe tells Rachel that she kissed Ralph Lauren at Rachels workplace.

programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Got High

programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their silly high school dance routine for a television special.

programme.desc: Ross and Chandler bicker over which of them created a raunchy joke, Phoebe antagonises Monica and Rachel with her candour, and Joey reluctantly takes a job at Central Perk.

programme.desc: When Mandy devises a plan for partnering, Sig must rethink his own hard-won tactics. On the Time Bandit, John and Josh conspire to outmaneuver a Russian captain who tells them what to do in US waters. All hell breaks loose as two vessels collide.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: As hundreds of dolphins lead the Summer Bay into an approaching cyclone, Jake attempts a daring nighttime rescue in high seas. Scott Campbell Jr finds himself out of options, leaving Sig to make a controversial call to save the fishery.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs

programme.title: Ed Stafford: First Man Out

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys bring some homesteading mastery to a Vermont couple who start but rarely finish big projects. Marty creates viable access through dense terrain, Misty builds an underground garden and Matt bear-proofs the homestead with ingenious builds.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike discovers a true Japanese legend from the 1990s, the Nissan 300ZX twin turbo. It comes with all the aftermarket kit you might expect, which gets Ant thinking of upping the performance even more.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.desc: The story of the legendary breakout by World War II Allied POWs from Colditz Castle, the Germans supposedly escape-proof fortress in Saxony. Undaunted by the threat of execution, the inmates try every conceivable means of escape - until someone hits upon the audacious idea of walking out dressed as enemy officers.

programme.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: After a fantastic last auction Thomas Plant and Mark Stacey are on a roll as they hunt for antique treasure across East Anglia on todays Antiques Road Trip. Along the way Thomas hears the inspiring story of a pioneering nurse and Mark learns the incredible history of a Dunwich lost to the waves. They then hit the road towards their penultimate auction in Norwich.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Drew and Tee are excited by the items on offer at the largest antiques market in Italy. And, they visit a picturesque town in Spain to look at a fascinating collection.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: Salvage Hunters

programme.title: The Repair Shop

programme.title: The Repair Shop

programme.desc: Alan Cumming heads to Merseyside on a voyage of discovery in Liverpool. His journey takes him from a recording studio hidden in a bar to Britains swankiest toilets.

programme.title: The Death of Bunny Munro
programme.desc: When Bunny and Juniors visit to Bunny Senior fails, Bunnys behaviour becomes increasingly erratic. Junior questions his future with Bunny, and Bunny senses that his own end is near.

programme.title: The Death of Bunny Munro
programme.desc: Bunny and Junior reach the sales expo, where Bunny is finally forced to confront his personal demons. He uses the opportunity to seek forgiveness from several key figures from his troubled past.

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: The Trials and Tribulations of Trying to Pee While Depressed
programme.desc: Rue watched 22 episodes straight of a British reality show when she feels depressed. Plus, Cassie seeks advice from her friends in the aftermath of Halloween night, while Jules visits an old friend.

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: And Salt the Earth Behind You
programme.desc: A group of high school students try to discover their own identities while dealing with drugs, trauma, love, and social media.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: Sledge trains for combat at Camp Elliott; Leckie is hospitalised after displaying physical and mental effects of combat.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Nine noble families in the seven kingdoms of Westeros vie for control of the Iron Throne. Meanwhile, a long forgotten race of ancient mythical creatures return to wreak havoc.

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Nine noble families in the seven kingdoms of Westeros vie for control of the Iron Throne. Meanwhile, a long forgotten race of ancient mythical creatures return to wreak havoc.

programme.title: Superman III
programme.desc: Clark Kents class reunion is disrupted when a villain forces a computer genius to help destroy Superman. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Oscar-winning World War II tale combining the story of an unusual rescue mission with an overwhelmingly powerful re-creation of the D-Day landings. A group of American soldiers are dispatched to locate one man among thousands, a US private whose three brothers have all been killed in action. The powers that be want to send him home to his family.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Portraying the early years of the man of steel, from his birth on the planet Krypton to his arrival on Earth and the first of his epic battles with the arch-criminal Lex Luthor. The superhero must prevent Luthors nefarious scheme to rearrange the west coast of America with the help of a couple of nuclear bombs.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: The curse of an ancient mummy protects buried treasure in the Egyptian desert. An American mercenary who knows of the secret location is rescued from a Cairo prison by an English historian and her brother, and together they set off on a hunt. Along the way, the trio encounter flesh-eating scarab beetles, killer sandstorms, and reincarnated demons.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.
An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: World leaders want Superman to intervene in the arms race, but he is caught in a dilemma - having vowed never to interfere in history. He eventually agrees to destroy all nuclear weapons, but then comes face to face with the android Protean Man, Lex Luthors latest evil creation. Luthor wants to stoke up the arms race, and sees the android - made from Kryptonite - as the only way to stop Superman.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks wedding anniversary celebrations are rudely interrupted by evil wizard Clavius, who once again wants to conquer the world. When Clavius kidnaps Queen Uberta, Odette and Derek must put a stop to his fiendish schemes.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: Batman and Robin have their hands full when Penguin, The Joker, Riddler and Catwoman join forces.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: The Swan Princess
programme.desc: A beautiful princess falls in love with a prince from another land, but an exiled magician who wants her for himself conjures up a spell to transform her into a swan. Forced to embark on a dangerous quest to reverse the magic, the princess is helped along by some new-found animal friends.

programme.title: Justice League Vs. Bizarro League
programme.desc: Superman, Batman and the rest of the Justice League team up with the Bizarro League to defeat Darkseid.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs. Mutants
programme.desc: Gotham City faces catastrophe when Mr Freeze transforms Killer Croc and Bane into mega-sized mutant monsters. As the gigantic villains go on the rampage, its up to the caped crusader to cut them down to size.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: When the beast-themed Animilitia plague Gotham, Batman swings out to investigate. But with The Penguin and his cyber-animals added to the mix, Batman will need the help of Green Arrow and The Flash to bring them to heel.

programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Rango

programme.title: Noahs Ark
programme.desc: A pair of mice, Vini and Tom, devise a plan to sneak onto Noahs Ark.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he goes on location to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day. His predicament drives him to distraction, until he sees a way of turning the situation to his advantage.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: The entire town is watching with bated breath as one of their own is up for an Oscar. They get more than they bargain for when he outs his high-school English teacher, who then has to prove to everyone, especially his fiancee, that hes straight. The press turn up and one reporter in particular is making life very difficult.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncles company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Wayne and Garth battle an evil TV producer in this big-screen adaptation of the `Saturday Night Live skit.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Danny is sour after driving away his girlfriend, and Wheeler is into anything wearing a skirt. The two get into a fight with a trucker and choose community service over a jail term.

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: A cynical TV weatherman finds himself reliving the same day over and over again when he goes on location to the small town of Punxsutawney to film a report about their annual Groundhog Day. His predicament drives him to distraction, until he sees a way of turning the situation to his advantage.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: Jim Hardy quits showbiz to run a farm with dance partner Linda Mason, but she stays on stage to pair up with Ted Hanover. A romantic merry-go-round with a spring in its step and a medley of favourite seasonal tunes by Irving Berlin.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Thriller about a photojournalist on board a destroyer, the Bedford, commanded by Captain Finlander. When the ship discovers a Soviet sub in Greenlands territorial waters, the Captain begins a relentless pursuit that pushes his crew to breaking point.

programme.title: Paper Moon
programme.desc: A Depression-era con man becomes the unwilling temporary guardian of a precocious nine-year-old orphan.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: John Wayne won an Oscar here as Rooster Cogburn, a lawman recruited by a teenager seeking revenge on her fathers murderer.

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: A once-talented pianist rejects his promising career to live a relaxed, blue-collar life as an oil rigger. On discovering that his father is ill some years later, he reluctantly returns home, only to find that he no longer fits in with either his artistic family or his working-class friends.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: Gunslinger Cole Thornton rides into a small town to work for a cattle baron, but quits after learning that his would-be employer wants to drive a family off their land and obtain their water supply. Thornton leaves the situation unresolved, but a chance encounter takes him back to El Dorado, where he joins the sheriff in a range war.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Golda
programme.desc: During the Yom Kippur War in 1973, Israeli Prime Minister Golda Meir must navigate overwhelming odds, a sceptical cabinet, and a complex relationship with US Secretary of State Henry Kissinger as millions of lives hang in the balance.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
programme.desc: Dreamer Max, ridiculed by his classmates, conjures up his perfect dreamworld - the Planet Drool, but his dream is more powerful than even he suspects, and his favourite dream superheroes, Sharkboy and Lavagirl, materialise on Earth. They bring news that an alien intelligence is threatening his beloved Planet Drool. Is it true, as Sharkboy and Lavagirl say, that only Max can stop it?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking
programme.desc: Mollie is a pregnant woman whose partner has deserted her. When she goes into labour, friendly taxi driver James rushes her to hospital and the pair become firm friends. He slowly falls in love with her and her baby Mikey, but shes still looking for her perfect partner, not realising hes right under her nose. However we can hear Mikeys thoughts, and he wants James as his Dad.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Too
programme.desc: A wisecracking toddler deals with toilet training, bickering parents and a baby sister in this sequel to the 1989 hit.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 8
programme.desc: The globetrotting crew faces an unexpected challenge when a mysterious woman named Cipher forces Dom to betray them all. Now, they must unite to bring home the man who made them a family and stop her from unleashing chaos on a grand scale.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One mans brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after its revealed hes a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Primatologist Davis Okoye shares an unshakable bond with George, an extraordinarily intelligent silverback gorilla thats been in his care since birth. When a genetic experiment goes wrong, it causes George, a wolf and a reptile to grow to a monstrous size. As the mutated beasts embark on a path of destruction, Okoye teams up with a discredited genetic engineer and the military to secure an antidote and prevent a global catastrophe.

programme.title: William Tell
programme.desc: In 14th Century Switzerland, a once peaceful hunter leads his people in rebellion after his family and country are threatened by a tyrannical Austrian King. As the Holy Roman Empire crumbles, the quiet lives of the Swiss peasants are upended.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kravens complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. Based on DC Comics characters.

programme.title: Hounds of War
programme.desc: A mercenary seeks revenge after his entire team gets wiped out during a final mission.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his familys ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.desc: The Herdmans are six siblings who have a reputation for being the worst kids in the world. However, when they take over the local church pageant during the holidays, they just might teach a shocked community the true meaning of Christmas.

programme.title: Tidings for the Season
programme.desc: A serious TV newscasters life changes when he meets his young superfan and the boys hardworking single mum. As he embraces positive holiday stories, romance blooms - but a career opportunity forces him to choose between ambition and love.

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: In the 1950s, New York crime bosses Frank Costello and Vito Genovese vie for control of the streets. Once the best of friends, petty jealousies and a series of betrayals place them on a deadly collision course that reshapes organised crime forever.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Alice travels to the Hive in Raccoon City to prevent the evil Umbrella Corp. from wiping out the last remaining survivors of the zombie apocalypse.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A deep space transporter crash-lands on a desolate planet circled by three suns. Among the survivors are pilot Carolyn Fry, mystic Abu `Imam al-Walid, cop William J Johns and convicted criminal Richard B Riddick, and their first thoughts are of survival and escape. Then Fry finds out that the planet suffers a total eclipse every 22 years, which is when the hibernating, flesh-eating inhabitants awake and hunt.

programme.title: Black Christmas

programme.title: The Cinema List: Family Festive Fun
programme.desc: Snuggle up for festive fun with this magical Christmas edition of the Cinema List, featuring The Polar Express, A Boy Called Christmas, Nativity! and more heart-warming family favourites.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: An Alpine Holiday
programme.desc: Estranged sisters Faith and Kelly reunite to fulfil their grandmothers last wish as they travel to the French Alps for Christmas, bonding and finding love along the way. (2025, 95 mins)

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: Ten-year-old Gloria and her grandfather Bud befriend a mysterious reindeer when the family gathers for Christmas. Bud comes to believe that Prancer may actually be magical, but Gloria fears his theory will send him straight to a retirement home.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO tries to close her hard-partying brothers branch, he and his chief technical officer must inspire their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and save their jobs.

programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: As rioting and civil unrest rocks Detroit during the summer of 1967, several policemen begin interrogating guests at the Algiers Motel. By the end of the night, three unarmed men are gunned down while several others are brutally beaten.

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A detective and a Secret Service agent investigate the abduction of a senators daughter from a school.

programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

Their vision: to take a community of reluctant fans, semi-talented players and a roster of ever-changing managers to Premiership glory. The new owners, risking ridicule and commercial failure, allowed cameras to record the extraordinary roller-coaster ride.

programme.desc: Since America has long found it easier to laugh about sex than talk seriously about it, sitcom humour has had a critical role ushering in a new era of openness, not just towards sex, but toward womens rights and gender identity.

programme.desc: Rejected by Hollywood, Bruce Lee returned to Hong Kong to complete four films. Charting his struggles in two worlds, exploring questions of identity and representation through rare archive, intimate interviews, and his writings.

Meanwhile, the clockhouse has been overrun by the Spring Chicks cousins who have come to stay.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah declare its `Camping Time and set off for the Gnarly Tree, but when the Spring Chicks tag along and pester them for their banana muffins, they move camp and forget to tell anyone where they have gone - causing a dreadful panic in Tickety town as Chime Time approaches.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Everyone is in the town square swapping something they dont want for something they do. programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.title: World Darts Championship
programme.desc: The final of the 2024-25 World Darts Championship at Alexandra Palace in London.

programme.title: Darts Gold
programme.desc: Phil Taylor faces Michael Van Gerwen.

programme.title: Darts Gold
programme.sub-title: 1994/95 WDC: Dennis Priestley v Jockie Wilson
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic darts matches. Here Dennis Priestley takes on Jocky Wilson in the group stage of the 1995 World Darts Championship.

programme.title: Darts Gold
programme.sub-title: 2005/06 WDC Semi-Final: Phil Taylor v Wayne Mardle
programme.desc: A chance to relive some classic darts matches. Here Phil Taylor takes on Wayne Mardle in the semi-finals of the 2006 World Darts Championship.

programme.title: 30 Years of the PDC World Championships
programme.sub-title: Rob Cross, A Year To Remember
programme.desc: At the first time of asking, Rob Cross shocked the world on his PDC World Darts Championship debut by defeating the retiring Phil Taylor in the final at Alexandra Palace in 2018.

programme.title: PDC Classics
programme.sub-title: 2004 World Championship: Phil Taylor v Kevin Painter
programme.desc: Trailing Kevin Painter 4-1, a ninth World Championship title looked out of reach for Phil Taylor. Cue a miraculous recovery and a breathtaking sudden death leg. Contains flashing images.

programme.title: 30 Years of the PDC World Championships
programme.desc: A two-time winner of the coveted Sid Waddell Trophy, Peter Snakebite Wright recounts the highs and lows of PDC World Darts Championship glory.

programme.title: World Darts Championship
programme.desc: The final of the 2024-25 World Darts Championship at Alexandra Palace in London.

programme.title: Game Of Throws: Inside Darts
programme.desc: This series tracks the action from preparation to the final and beyond, following Michael van Gerwen, Luke Humphries and Luke Littler.

programme.title: Game Of Throws: Inside Darts
programme.desc: New and Exclusive. The pressures immense, not just for Littler but the other players, too - and like all professional sports, the world of darts is not without its demons. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Game Of Throws: Inside Darts
programme.desc: New and Exclusive. Just nine players now remain. With the world number one knocked out, 16-year-old Littlers sensational skill and swagger has seen him breeze through. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: World Darts Championship
programme.desc: The final of the 2024-25 World Darts Championship at Alexandra Palace in London.

programme.title: Gerwyn Price: 2021 World Champion
programme.desc: In January 2021, Gerwyn Price claimed his first World Darts Championship title and secured the world number one spot in the process. Here, look at his remarkable triumph.

programme.title: World Darts Championship
programme.desc: A recap of the final at the 2024-25 World Darts Championship from Alexandra Palace in London.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson explores Parkgate, on the estuary of the River Dee in Cheshire. Today the village is landlocked, cut off from the Dee and the Irish Sea due to the estuarys shifting silt. But 250 years ago, it was a bustling harbour and as Ben finds out from Dr Gillian OBrian, Parkgate was a gateway for thousands of Irish immigrants from the 1620s onwards.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson uncovers how the health and fortune of the village was shaped by those in charge of Bamburghs famous castle.

programme.title: Secrets and Spies: A Nuclear Game
programme.desc: Its 1985, and Mikhail Gorbachev is the new, young leader of the Soviet Union at a very tense time. While both sides have hopes of peace, they have been publicly stockpiling nuclear weapons for decades, and neither wants to appear weak.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team make a return to Wimbledons All England Tennis Club, meeting Londoners bringing their precious heirlooms for appraisal. Objects featured include memorabilia from the first London Olympics in 1908 and an archive depicting the illusionist who inspired a five-year-old Harry Houdini to try his hand at escapology. Plus, a pencil-drawn portrait of Nelson.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return to Manchester Town Hall where a big crowd awaits with their family treasures. Objects appearing on camera include a magnificent painted panel found in a disused biscuit factory and a single plate with a five figure valuation, plus a small picture by LS Lowry, gifted by the artist, brings good news to the owner.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team snap up a slightly saggy Seventies Saab 96, but despite a stunning restoration, could it result in a record financial loss when it goes to auction?

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: War Factories

programme.desc: No matter how many soldiers you have, how smart your generals are or how daring your strategy is, a war will not be won if there is not enough bullets, planes or food.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A second visit to Birmingham University for Fiona Bruce and the team as they embark on another busy day of valuations. Amongst the family heirlooms on display are the biggest vases ever seen on the show, a table which has seen its value dented after it was chewed by a dog, and Princess Margarets earrings and brooch. Plus, there is a knockout valuation for a stunning silver travelling set.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A return visit to the Weald and Downland Open Air Museum, near Chichester, for Fiona Bruce and the team of experts. Objects featured include an elaborate clock which until recently was used as a door stop and has more importance than at first anticipated, poignant letters from a convict transported to Australia for shoplifting in 1800, and an old family toy has a surprise in store for its owners.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: A super rare Reliant Scimitar GTC undergoes an expert recommission, leaving no bolt unturned. And a Honda CBR superbike from the 80s is in need of repair.

programme.title: Jaan
programme.desc: Police Commisioner Suryadev Singh appoints Karan as Kajals bodyguard as she is facing danger from Vishamber. The truth is that Karan is Vishambers man who is sent to kill Kajal.

programme.title: Coolie
programme.desc: When Iqbal was young he was separated from his mother and brother by a flood, and he becomes a coolie at Mumbai railway station. Coolies are at the bottom of the social ladder and treated badly by others, so Iqbal pledges to fight for Coolie rights, as they are the only family he has. The businessman at the core of the conflict is the same man who kept his family from him. In defeating him, Iqbal may kill two birds with one stone.

programme.title: Tadka
programme.desc: Seasoned with the right amount of spice and oodles of cuteness, an unintended romance unfolds between a radio jockey and a middle-aged archaeologist, with food playing Cupid.

programme.desc: When the daughter of nations best lawyer is kidnapped, she is forced to save a rapist from death sentence, for the ransom, within only four days.
